title: New: Disclosure – Flow
content:
With Disclosure’s set at London’s highly respected club night Church only a few hours away, it seems fitting that they squeezed in this roast dinner sized banger before the big night. As club bangers go, ‘Flow’ is up there with the very best. The whole thing oscillates to the thumping and jerking rhythm, the thick synth work slotting perfectly to the dubstep infused beat. What elevates the track however are the vocals, the purity of the message, “get on the floor”, combined with the smoothness of the voice itself blends all the sounds and textures into a universal delight.

This Friday’s Church line-up

BODDIKA (Swamp81)

SYNKRO

DISCLOSURE

IFAN DAFYDD

JUK JUK

DAMU

Grab your tickets here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
